name: Energy price market application
tagline: A multi energy market cloud scheduling application
body:
### Energy price market application


This is the homepage for the energy price management application developed for completion of the master's thesis "Cost aware resource management for distributed cloud data centers"


Link to energy price management application: https://github.com/epma16/epma

Link to algorithms and models in R: https://github.com/epma16/rstats

Link to cloud simulator: https://github.com/epma16/philharmonic
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
